page.title: 06FARMING
page.content:
THERE ARE 11 OR 12 FARMS IN THE AREA.THEY FALL INTO TWO DISTINCT TYPES.HERE IS A DESCRIPTION OF A FARM WITH CATTLE,SHEEP AND SOME ARABLE LAND. SEE ALSO PAGE 5.
THE FARM CONSISTS OF 110 ACRES INCLUDING BUILDINGS AND WASTE LAND. THERE ARE 150 BULLOCKS AND 11 BEEF STOCK COWS IN TWO FIELDS. 52 EWES AND 82 LAMBS OCCUPY ONE FIELD. THERE ARE 35 ACRES OF GRASSLAND FOR SILAGE AND HAY IN ADDITION. 35 ACRES OF WHEAT, 3 ACRES OF OATS, AND 6 ACRES OF POTATOES ARE BEING GROWN. 20 HENS RANGE OVER WASTE LAND.
THE FARM HAS TWO TRACTORS AND SIMILAR EQUIPMENT TO THE OTHER FARM ON PAGE 5 EXCEPT FOR TWO PLOUGHS INSTEAD OF ONE.
